name: userstyles.org: Colorful
additional_info:
This style is based on the cool style 60162 by user 132239. The basic color scheme and fonts are from there, I just polished a bit. It also uses style 51344 by user 14255 to organize the mess that is the user acount page. Thank you both.

(03/12/2013) Some little updates.
(12/04/2012) More code optimization.
(23/03/2012) Changes to style lists and some other refinements.
(12/03/2012) Some code optimization.
